main event: A white, glowing, round object was sighted over Sheffield, England on August 27, 1952. The object was approximately 30 feet in diameter and traveled at a high rate of speed, making a number of sudden, sharp turns.
interesting points: The object was observed by a number of people, including several police officers.

The incident was briefly covered in the national press, but no further details became publicly available due to issues of national security and the requirements of the Ministry of Defense for confidentiality.
